name: shelly-streamdeck-plugin
description: Stream Deck plugin for controlling Shelly Plus 1 and Shelly Plus RGBW PM devices

scripts.build: tsc && npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets-first
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc --watch" "onchange dist/plugin.js -- npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets && streamdeck restart com.shelly"
